H0.text: Who was the British Admiral who died in 1707 when four of his ships were wrecked in the Scilly Isles. Rooke

H1.text: Who was the British Admiral who died in 1707 when four of his ships were wrecked in the Scilly Isles. Byng

H2.text: Who was the British Admiral who died in 1707 when four of his ships were wrecked in the Scilly Isles. Hawke

H3.text: Who was the British Admiral who died in 1707 when four of his ships were wrecked in the Scilly Isles. Shovell

A4.text: Four large ships, HMS Association, the third-rate HMS Eagle, the fourth-rate HMS Romney and the fire ship HMS Firebrand all sank.
